.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueTuple extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable, class System.IComparable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple>, class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple>
Public Structure ValueTuple Implements IComparable, IComparable(Of ValueTuple), IEquatable(Of ValueTuple), IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
public value class ValueTuple : IComparable, IComparable<ValueTuple>, IEquatable<ValueTuple>, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 提供用於建立值元組的靜態方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating value tuples.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數目的項目序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of elements. Tuple 的範例是具有三個項目 （又稱為 3 tuple 或三重物件） 用來儲存識別碼，例如，某個人的名稱在第一個項目，在第二個元素，且該人員的 income 該年份的第三個項目中之年的資料結構。An example of a tuple is a data structure with three elements (known as a 3-tuple or triple) that is used to store an identifier such as a person's name in the first element, a year in the second element, and the person's income for that year in the third element. 值的 tuple 是 tuple 中導入的類型[!INCLUDE[net_v463](~/includes/net-v463-md.md)]提供的執行階段實作[C# 中的 tuple](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)和結構在 F # 中的 tuple。Value tuples are tuple types introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v463](~/includes/net-v463-md.md)] to provide the runtime implementation of [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 有何差異的元組類別，例如，等等，如下所示：They differ from the tuple classes, such as , , etc., as follows: - 它們是結構 （實值類型），而不是類別 （參考型別）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 它們是可變動而不是唯讀狀態。They are mutable rather than read-only. 也就是說，tuple 元件的值可能會變更。That is, the value of tuple components can change. - 資料成員，例如`Item1`，`Item2`等等，欄位，而不是屬性。Their data members, such as `Item1`, `Item2`, etc., are fields rather than properties. 結構代表 tuple，其中沒有任何項目。The structure represents a tuple that has no elements. 它是主要用於它的靜態方法，可讓您建立並比較值 tuple 類型的執行個體。It is useful primarily for its static methods that let you create and compare instances of value tuple types. 及其協助程式方法可讓您不必明確指定每個數值 tuple 元件的類型執行個體化值 tuple。Its helper methods let you instantiate value tuples without having to explicitly specify the type of each value tuple component. 藉由呼叫它的靜態方法，您可以從零到八個元件建立具有值 tuple。By calling its static methods, you can create value tuples that have from zero to eight components. 針對值 tuple 的八個以上的元件，您必須呼叫建構函式。For value tuples with more than eight components, you must call the constructor. ### 序列化和值的 tupleSerialization and value tuples 類型不是可序列化的.NET Core 1.x 或.NET Framework 4.7 和更早版本中。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET 標準，包括標準的.NET 2.0，不會要求的序列化執行個體; 是否是可序列化的執行個體取決於個別的.NET 標準實作。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要判斷是否型別可序列化特定的.NET 實作、 取得物件，代表類型及擷取的值其屬性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 如需可序列化的型別.NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的清單，請參閱[二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

summary.span: 比較目前的 執行個體與指定的 執行個體。

span.span: Compares the current instance to a specified instance.
This method always returns 0.

remarks.format: Because a <xref:System.ValueTuple> instance has no elements, any two <xref:System.ValueTuple> instances are considered to be equivalent.

span.span: is not a instance.

summary.span: 建立新的值元組執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new value tuple instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 helper 方法，您可以呼叫來執行個體化 8 元件值 tuple，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate an 8-component value tuple without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫建構函式來建立具有九個或多個元件的 tuple，除非您的語言提供此用途的特殊語法。You must call the constructor to create a tuple with nine or more components unless your language provides a special syntax for this purpose. 靜態方法結構無法用於建立 tuple 的九個或多個元件。The static methods of the structure cannot be used to create a tuple with nine or more components.
